title: Fine-Tuning or Retrieval? Comparing Knowledge Injection in LLMs. (arXiv:2312.05934v2 [cs.AI] UPDATED)

tldr: 该研究比较了无监督的微调和检索增强生成（RAG）这两种常见方法在LLMs中的应用。结果发现，RAG在现有知识和新知识上表现出更好的性能，而LLMs通过无监督的微调学习新的事实信息较困难。
en_tdlr: This study compares the applications of unsupervised fine-tuning and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) in LLMs. The findings show that RAG outperforms unsupervised fine-tuning in both existing and new knowledge, while LLMs struggle to learn new factual information through unsupervised fine-tuning.
